data.name: Voucher
data.value: Vouchers

data.name: VoucherDesc1
data.value:
Automatically convert your Clubcard points to vouchers. You'll get £0.50 in vouchers for every 50 points earned.

Once you are opted in, all of your points will be converted to vouchers from your next statement. You can spend vouchers in store, online, or with our partners, where you'll get up to 4x your voucher value.

data.name: VoucherDesc2
data.value: In order to receive Clubcard vouchers, you need to collect a minimum of 150 points per collection period. If you don't reach this amount, your points will be carried forward to your next statement.

data.name: ClubcardPartners
data.value: More information on how to spend your vouchers

data.name: VoucherOptInDesc1
data.value:
You have opted to automatically convert your Clubcard points to vouchers.You'll get £0.50 in vouchers for every 50 points earned.

You will receive new vouchers with your next quarterly statement. You can spend vouchers in store, online, or with our partners, where you'll get up to 4x your voucher value.

data.name: MessageBAMilesOptedOut3
data.value: In order to receive British Airways Executive Club Avios, you need to collect a minimum of 150 points per collection period. If you don't reach this amount, your points will be carried forward to your next statement.

data.name: MessageChristmasSaverOpted
